The procedures for applying for a job typically involve researching the company or organization you are applying to, creating a resume and cover letter that highlights your skills and experience, and then submitting your application materials either through email or in person. Additionally, you may need to complete an online application and/or participate in a phone or in-person interview.

 The Board of Directors is a group of people elected by the shareholders to represent their interests and make decisions on their behalf. The CEO is the head of the company and is responsible for the day-to-day operations of the business. The stockholders are the actual owners of the company and have a say in the decisions made by the Board of Directors.

 The Dragon-Boat Festival is an annual event celebrated by Chinese people and other East Asians. It is held in honor of the death of the Chinese patriot and poet Qu Yuan, who lived during the Warring States period of Chinese history. The festival is also a celebration of the summer solstice and is traditionally a time for people to make offerings to their ancestors.
